item.title: Download C# Library to Create, Edit XPS PS | Aspose.Page API
item.description: Support Forum Download Aspose.Page for XPS File Manipulation Open NuGet Package Manager within the Microsoft Visual Studio®, search for Aspose.Page and install. You may also use the following command within the Package Manager Console. For the detailed instructions please visit the Installation documentation page. Release Notes Download PM> Install-Package Aspose.Page   Product Page | Docs | Demos | API Reference | Examples | Blog | Search | Free Support | Temporary License | EULA

item.title: Aspose.PDF | Java PDF Document Processing Class Library
item.description: Java API to Process & Manipulate PDF Files Product Page | Docs | Demos | API Reference | Examples | Blog | Search | Free Support | Temporary License Aspose.PDF for Java is a PDF document creation component that enables your Java applications to read, write and manipulate PDF documents without using Adobe Acrobat. aspose.pdf Package Features PDF Document Featres Set basic information (e.g. author, creator) of the PDF document.

item.title: Aspose.Page | Java Class Library for PostScript Processing
item.description: Java APIs for PS, EPS & XPS File Formats Product Page | Docs | Demos | API Reference | Examples | Blog | Search | Free Support | Temporary License Aspose.Page for Java offers to creating & manipulate XPS documents. It also provides functionality to convert XPS, PS & EPS documents to image formats & PDF. Manipulate XPS Documents via Java Create and edit XPS document. Add or remove pages of XPS document.

item.title: Download XPS Creation, Conversion C++ DLL | Aspose.Page API
item.description: Support Forum Download C++ Library to Process XPS, EPS, PS Files Open NuGet Package Manager within the Microsoft Visual Studio®, search for Aspose.Page.Cpp and install. item.title: Download Python Library to Create, Edit XPS PS EPS | Aspose.Page API
item.description: Support Forum Download Aspose.Page for Python via .NET for PS and XPS File Manipulation Aspose.Page for Python via .NET, The PS, EPS, and XPS files Processing API enables developers to work with PDF documents without relying on Microsoft Office® or Adobe&reg products installed. You can easily use Aspose.Page for Python via .NET from pip with the following command. Release Notes Download > pip install aspose-page
